description:
I purchased Quake on steam and it does come with the music tracks. I cannot figure out where to place the music folder? Any advice would be appreciated and I did make sure EZQuake is compatible with the original soundtrack. 

References:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=119489135
https://ezquake.com/docs/settings/sound.html

Game data pak0.pak and pak1.pak must be added to:
~/.var/app/io.github.ezQuake/.ezquake/id1/
